actions.command: execute positioned ~ ~0.5 ~ facing entity @s eyes run function manhunt:abilities/incarnated_boomring

name: Kamikaze
description: Charging up your kamikaze will cause an explosion, charging longer will cause a stronger explosion.

badges.text:
§6§lKAMIKAZE 💣§r
§7Prime yourself with a potent §r§cExplosion§r§7 at your location on a delay.
§7Kamikaze has §r§e4 Tiers§r§7 of power you can choose from, each §r§astronger§r§7 than the last, but with an §r§cincreased§r§7 delay and cooldown.
§7At §r§eclose range§r§7, the Explosion deals additional §r§4True Damage§r§7 on top of the normal damage.

§a§l⇶ §r§7Range: §r§f4 Blocks§r§8 (+2 Per Tier above 1)
§c⚔§r§7 Attack Damage: §r§f4§r§8/§r§f8§r§8/§r§f10§r§8/§r§f12
§c§l⚔§r§7 True Damage: §r§f4§r§8/§r§f6§r§8/§r§f12§r§8/§r§f14
§6🕒§r§7 Windup: §r§f1.5s§r§8/§r§f3s§r§8/§r§f5s§r§8/§r§f10s
§e⌛§r§7 Cooldown: §r§f1m§r§8 (+10s Per Tier above 1)

§7§lActive Ability

§7Charge by pressing §r%s§r§7!
After clicking, you have §r§e1.5s§r§7 to click again and increase the tier of the explosion.
